parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the DTS task. The DTS task can be a data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking task.

parameters.name: JobProgressId
parameters.description: The ID of the primary key.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the DTS instance. For more information, see [Supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: ZeroEtlJob
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query only zero-extract, transform, load (ETL) integration tasks. Valid values:

*   **true**: yes.
*   **false**: no.
